title: settings
description: JSON schema for the configuration of the participant-visit-listing
overview:
The most straightforward way to customize the Participant Visit Listing is by using a configuration object whose properties describe the behavior and appearance of the displays.
The Participant Visit Listing object contains Webcharts both `table` and `chart` objects, and the user settings will overwrite the default settings of each of those objects.
Refer to the Webcharts [table](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Table-Configuration) and [chart](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Chart-Configuration) configuration wikis for more details on these settings.
In addition to the standard Webcharts settings several custom settings not available in the base Webcharts library have been added to the Participant Visit Listing to facilitate data mapping and other custom functionality.
These custom settings are described in detail below.
All defaults can be overwritten by users.

site_col.title: Site
site_col.description: name of variable that captures site

id_col.title: Participant ID
id_col.description: name of variable that captures participant ID

id_status_col.title: Participant Status
id_status_col.description: name of variable that captures participant status

visit_col.title: Visit
visit_col.description: name of variable that captures visit

visit_order_col.title: Sort Order of Visit
visit_order_col.description: name of variable that captures sort order of visit

visit_date_col.title: Date of Visit
visit_date_col.description: name of variable that captures date of visit

visit_day_col.title: Study Day of Visit
visit_day_col.description: name of variable that captures study day of visit

visit_status_col.title: Visit Status
visit_status_col.description: name of variable that captures status of visit

visit_status_order_col.title: Sort Order of Visit Status
visit_status_order_col.description: name of variable that captures sort order of visit status

visit_text_col.title: Listing Cell Text
visit_text_col.description: name of variable that captures text to be printed in listing cells

visit_text_color_col.title: Visit Status Color
visit_text_color_col.description: name of variable that captures desired color of visit status

visit_status_description_col.title: Description of Visit Status
visit_status_description_col.description: name of variable that captures a more detailed description of the visit status

visit_expectation_pattern.title: Visit Expectation Text Pattern
visit_expectation_pattern.description: this string will be converted to a regular expression that will identify visit statuses that represent overdue or future visits

visit_exclusion_pattern.title: Visit Exclusion Text Pattern
visit_exclusion_pattern.description: this string will be converted to a regular expression that will identify non-scheduled visits, e.g. unscheduled, repeat, and early termination visits

visit_status_exclusion_col.title: Visit Status Exclusion Flag
visit_status_exclusion_col.description: name of variable that identifies visit statuses to exclude from visit status legend

visit_status_exclusion_value.title: Visit Status Exclusion Value
visit_status_exclusion_value.description: value of variable that identifies visit statuses to exclude from visit status legend

active_tab.title: Initially Active Tab
active_tab.description: name of tab, Listing or Charts, that is displayed initially

date_format.title: Visit Date Format
date_format.description: a strptime specification of time format directives, used to parse visit date

display_cell_text.title: Display Listing Cell Text?
display_cell_text.description: controls the display of the listing, either as a heat map or as a listing

chart_margin.title: Chart Margins
chart_margin.description: controls the margins of the charts; modify as needed to create space for rotated x-axis tick labels

filter_cols.title: Custom Filter Variables
filter_cols.description: custom filter variables, in addition to site and participant status

pagination.title: Listing Pagination?
pagination.description: disable pagination to view all participants at the same time

exports.title: Listing Export Formats
exports.description: default export formats are to .xlsx and .csv; if jsPDF is available export to .pdf will also be available
